spring.000: Hey, @. Are you waiting for a bus too? I am going to ZuZu city for college. The bus I need to take is always a bit late.$s
marriage.000: Honey! I am waiting for the bus to go to ZuZu city to work as an assistant in college. Tell me you will miss me!$l
nightmarket.000: @, look at these stuff! Aren't they cool?$h#$e#Hmm, they seem pretty expensive...
